# Howard J. Ford

Howard J. Ford is an English independent filmmaker, writer-director and producer, known especially for his 2021 film The Lockdown Hauntings, starring Tony Todd, Angela Dixon and Russell Shaw, which was filmed entirely during the COVID-19 lockdown.
Other works of his include The Dead (2010), starring Prince David Osei and David Dontoh, Escape (2023), starring Sarah Alexandra Marks and The Dead 2: India, starring Joseph Millson .
